attributes.action: Order that speed bumps are put on Queens Avenue in Aldershot.
attributes.background: Queens Avenue is a long military road that runs from North Camp to Aldershot, this road is used constantly by pedestrians and the miitary and  houses a military estate, a school, sports clubs and churches, 2 young talented girls were killed on this road last night, don't let anymore deaths occur.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Queens Avenue in Aldershot appears to be the responsibility of Hampshire County Council. 
 
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 
 
You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

https://www.hants.gov.uk/aboutthecouncil/haveyoursay/petitions
